Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
Hello! How can I assist you today?
my account credit balance is showign 0 and i have used only 346$ out of 1000$. so why it is 0

I'm sorry to hear that your account credit balance is showing 0. Could you please let me know which platform or service you are using for your account? This will help me provide more specific assistance.

Thanks for the information. It seems like there might be an issue with your ad credit balance. I recommend checking out our billing guide for more details on how ad credits work and what to do if you encounter issues. You can find it here: [Billing Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17821681919757-Billing-Guide). If the issue persists, please contact your bank or update your payment method and resubmit your ads.
Connecting you to a live agent. Please hold.
